channel.title: SCIM :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 473 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: no changes needed to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: A high-level overview of SCIM and how it powers LCM. This is a rework of the current SCIM concept doc, that then provides links to the Build > Get Started > Create a SAML app integration > Build a SCIM App (ID: 781) and the Build > Manage User Accounts > Manage a Users Lifecycle > SCIM section (ID: 474)
